title: "我们华人不歧视马来人，但你说我像他们，就如同侮辱我是杂种猪头”
contents:
加上了英文按语发到推特。因为字数限制，无法严格全部直译。
An example of Chinese political correctness. "Drawing a parallel b/t a Chinese Malaysian & a Malay almost amounts to equating a person with a bastard or pig head. None of us can stand such an insult. We aren't being discriminatory but this is a fact. " An answer on Zhihu says.

有人误以为这位是中国人，我回应说：

The speaker in this screenshot is a natural born Malaysian citizen. But his statement treats many of his neighbors, colleagues and personal friends (if he happens to have any), and his own King, an ethnic Malay to whom he pledges allegiance, no better than "a bastard or pig head".

中文翻译：截图中人是在马来西亚出生的马来西亚公民，但他的说法把自己的很多邻居、同事和私人朋友（如果他有的话），以及他自己的国王——一位他宣誓效忠的马来人——，都当作”杂种猪头”了。
